pages.privacyPolicy: Sphere Furn - Crafting Comfort for Every Room Sphere furn home stone products custom furniture +91 714 2940958 Request a call Privacy Policy Welcome to Sphere furn ("we," "our," "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or make a purchase from our store. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Name, email address, phone number, billing and shipping address, payment information. Browser type, IP address, pages visited, and other usage data. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes: - To process and fulfill your orders. - To communicate with you about your orders, inquiries, and other customer service needs. - To improve our website, products, and services. - To send you promotional materials and updates, if you have opted in to receive them. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as described below: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. You have the right to: - Access and update your personal information. - Opt-out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those emails. - Request the deletion of your personal information, subject to certain legal exceptions. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: Spherefurn@gmail.com Phone: +91 714 2940958 Endereço: Address: Gorepeth, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440012, India Phone: +91 714 2940958 Email: Spherefurn@gmail.com Address: Gorepeth, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440012, India Privacy Policy Terms of Use
pages.stoneProduct: Sphere Furn - stone products: Where Comfort Meets Styl Sphere furn home stone products custom furniture +91 714 2940958 Request a call countertops, tables and window sills artificial stone Thanks to our calculator you can find out the cost Calculate the cost Eco-friendly 100% harmless Durable 20 years warranty Stylish more than 1000 colors Artificial stone products from the manufacturer Having our own workshop and technical know-how, we manufacture countertops. We carry out quality control of all products Window sills Order Tabletops Order Tables Order Sinks and sinks Order Why choose artificial stone Products made from artificial stone have almost all the properties that natural materials have: durability, strength, reliability and attractive appearance. He combined not only the best properties of natural stones, but also added to them colors rarely found in nature. Reliable waterproofing, a one-piece product (no edge material), does not absorb moisture and foreign odors, as well as does not emit them, eliminates the appearance of mold and fungi. Artificial stone is durable and repairable. It will serve you for many years without losing its initial characteristics. Manufacturers of artificial stone guarantee its service life of 50 years or more. If abrasions and minor scratches occur, the front surface can be easily polished with automotive polishing pastes until a new surface is obtained. Fire and heat resistance Artificial stone products retains its properties at temperatures from -30°C to +150°C at short term impact. We can make any shape without seams Easy to maintain, no dirt gets into the countertop Environmentally friendly - can be used in medical institutions and labor houses Accepts ambient temperature Lack of micropores, does not absorb moisture Large selection of colors and textures Durability - resistance to acids, abrasions, shock and high temperatures Obvious advantages of an artificial stone solution: Artificial stone became widespread not so long ago and immediately gained popularity in the design of kitchens and bathrooms. The material, resistant to liquids and temperature changes, allows you to create the interior of your dreams, practical for daily use. To calculate the cost, leave a request and our master will come to you for a FREE measurement. submit your application Phone: +91 714 2940958 Email: Spherefurn@gmail.com Address: Gorepeth, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440012, India Privacy Policy Terms of Use
